Metamorph_Elasticity.description: You possess ultimate control over your body. You are elastic and malleable! You can will this form to stretch at your whim.
notes: Metamorph (Major) Elasticity - At the beginning of each turn, spend a free action and select one of the forms below:

Metamorph_Shape-Shifter.description: You possess ultimate control over your body. You are a shapeshifter capable of assuming multiple forms! You can will this form to change at your whim.
notes: Metamorph (Major) Shape-Shifter - At the beginning of each turn, spend a free action and select one of the forms below:
Metamorph - If you are a Shape-Shifter, you can replace any power or ability in the above forms with the Amphibious power.

Metamorph - If you take the Shape-Shifter track you can give up the minor power selection the Metamorph archetype grants you and instead choose one of the forms from the Elasticity track to give yourself even more versatility!
